__e: You took the fall for Fletcher, and that tape proves it.
I want for you to tell us here and now, and for your own protection, what is going on, what is set up, where Fletcher is and everything you know.
I don't like that Commander Fletcher... and I don't trust anything about him or his sergeant.
Fletcher is much, much junior to you, of course, and, uh, as such, his speech would come first, and yours last.
Well, I don't know who this Fletcher guy is, but, um, ...at least, you know, from what you said, he... seemed nice.
A weekend like Fletcher's is exactly what I need.
